statements: DELETE FROM zoning_regulations WHERE id = 100 AND land_use_category = 'Residential';
DELETE FROM zoning_regulations WHERE zoning_code = 'R1' AND setback_requirement < 20;
DELETE FROM zoning_districts WHERE residential_density > 100 AND district_name = 'Residential';
DELETE FROM permitted_uses WHERE land_use_category_id = 1 AND zone_id = 3;
DELETE FROM zoning_map WHERE zone_id = 2 AND parcel_id = 5;
DELETE FROM violation_records WHERE violation_description = 'Unauthorized construction';
